thread.title: Djembefola United kicks off Raahgiri Day at Connaught Place in Delhi
thread.title_full: Djembefola United kicks off Raahgiri Day at Connaught Place in Delhi - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Djembefola United kicks off Raahgiri Day at Connaught Place in Delhi
text:
This Sunday morning, Connaught Place turned into one giant fitness centre as Dilliwallahs discovered the fitness freaks within themselves through activities like Zumba, aerobics, yoga and a lot more at Raahgiri Day, supported by the Times of India.
The percussion band Djembefola United kicked off the morning with a foot-tapping performance which had dancers showing off moves from alternative dance forms. This was followed by an invigorating Zumba and cha-cha workshop by Beats & Fusion that had the crowd dancing along merrily. In line with the fitness theme of the morning, the group Yog Youngistan conducted a session on aerobics and yoga set to the tunes of Hindi songs. Music lovers were in for a treat as well, as the band Vishuddh played some of the popular Bollywood melodies from this year to a loud applause from the audience.
People playing roadside sports was a common sight as sports lovers - young and old - indulged in friendly football, volleyball and badminton matches. Poornima, a college student, said, "Being a professional dancer, I love fitness-related activities, so it was great to see so many people getting involved in things like Zumba and aerobics. Personally, I always have fun here at Raahgiri because it combines my two loves - fitness and music."
